Title: Establishes a precinct commander appointment board in each police precinct in the city of New York for the purpose of evaluating and selecting the precinct commander for such police precinct
Summary: Directs the borough president of each borough in the city of New York to establish a precinct commander appointment board in each police precinct in the city of New York for the purpose of evaluating and selecting the precinct commander for such police precinct.
LawCode: Add ยง14-191, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a precinct commander appointment board in each police precinct in the city of New York for the purpose of evaluating and selecting the precinct commander for such police precinct
